### Description of variable
This section will describe the attributes for each columns:
<br><br>

|    Attribute    |    Description
|----------|-----------|
| **Diagnosis**  | Display the prediction of diagnosis where: *0= Malignant, 1=Benign* |
| **Radius_M** |  Mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter |
| **Texture_M** | The standard deviation of grayscale value |
| **Perimeter_M** | Perimeter of cell |
| **Area_M** | Area of cell |
| **Smootheness_M** | Local variation in radius lengths |
| **Compactness_M** | The perimeter^2 / area - 1.0 |
| **Concavity_M** | Severity of concave portions of the contour |
| **ConcavePoint_M** | Number of concave points of the contour |
| **Symmetry_M** | Mean for perimeter of samples collected |
| **FractalDimension_M** | "Coastline approximation" -1 |

<br>
